devdoc.details: This contract is to be used as a diamond facet (see ERC2535 Diamond Standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2535).Note: This facet depends on {ProxyAdminFacet}, {ContractOwnershipFacet} and {InterfaceDetectionFacet}.

batchSetTokenURI(uint256[],string[]).details: Reverts if the sender does not have the 'minter' role.

initERC721MetadataStorage(string,string).details: Note: This function should be called ONLY in the init function of a proxied contract.Reverts if the sender is not the proxy admin.Reverts if the proxy initialization phase is set to `1` or above.

setTokenURI(uint256,string).details: Reverts if the sender does not have the 'minter' role.

returns.uri: The metadata URI for the token identifier.

devdoc.title: ERC721 Non-Fungible Token Standard, optional extension: Metadata (facet version).

batchSetTokenURI(uint256[],string[]).notice: Sets the metadata URIs for a batch of tokens.

initERC721MetadataStorage(string,string).notice: Initializes the storage with a name and symbol.Sets the proxy initialization phase to `1`.Marks the following ERC165 interface(s) as supported: ERC721Metadata.

name().notice: Gets the name of the token. E.g. "My Token".

setTokenURI(uint256,string).notice: Sets the metadata URI for a token.

symbol().notice: Gets the symbol of the token. E.g. "TOK".

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Gets the metadata URI for a token identifier.

userdoc.notice: ERC721Metadata implementation where tokenURIs are set individually per token.
